title: Time Penalties (Mac Users) Patch 7.9
body: As at this point almost if not all Mac users understand that they are struggling with the 1/4 screen issue and many people including myself have left games due to this problem. Is there any way possible that people (including myself) can have their que time penalties removed once the problem is fixed? I just think it's unfair to punish players under these current circumstances where the player can't even see what he or she is doing.

replies.body: Don't expect mammonism company at all.

We're still in the process of sorting out this weird 1/4 screen crap that's been affecting a large number of you guys. Rest easy knowing that we're aware this was out of your control, and we're more than happy to look over your account if you were hit with this issue! Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can look over your account!
